reviewRating.ratingExplanation: Excellent for production LLM monitoring. Strong prompt versioning and debugging tools. Minor gaps in advanced reporting.

author.name: Sarah Chen
author.description: Sarah has evaluated 30+ RAG systems and LLM tools for Fortune 500 clients.

headline: LangSmith for LLM Evaluation: Hands-On Review
reviewBody: We tested LangSmith for 30 days on a production RAG system handling 10K queries/day. Testing period: October 1-31, 2024. Plan: Developer ($99/month). No vendor relationship. Verdict: Excellent for teams running >1K queries/day in production. Best-in-class prompt versioning and trace debugging. Minor gaps in advanced reporting vs. Weights & Biases.

itemListElement.name: Excellent prompt versioning and A/B testing
Strong debugging tools for failure cases
Limited export options for custom analysis

reviewAspect: LLM Observability, Prompt Management, Production Monitoring

hasPart.text: This review contains affiliate links. We may earn commissions from purchases. We paid for our own LangSmith subscription ($99/month Developer plan) for testing. No vendor relationship.
AI helped draft this review outline. We conducted all testing manually and made all editorial decisions.
